ProjectTitle: A Customized Intervention Approach to the Formation of Social Media Literacy
InitialFeedbackHistory: 03/04/2024 [REDACTED] Please list the different datasets in different rows, so you can refer to the different datatypes later in your DMP, eg survey, code, results files, etc [REDACTED] [REDACTED] you use OSF you can mention that you use their standardized metadata [REDACTED] [REDACTED] sharing data on OSF please make sure it is fully anonymous without any risk to re-identify the subjects. [REDACTED] you are not sure you can use RDR where you can restrict access, you can import your data from OSF using the integration dashboard: www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr/integration-dashboard. [REDACTED] publishing in OSF please register the metadata in LIRIAS so it will appear on your publication list (for RDR this is done automatically) see: https://research.kuleuven.be/en/associatienet/output/lirias/register-datasets-in-lirias
label: good with suggestions
